revised_title: The Role of Uterus and Ovaries in Pregnant Hamsters
tldr: The study investigates the relationship between the uterus and ovaries in pregnant hamsters. Ovariectomy during pregnancy leads to abortion, proving the necessity of ovaries and corpora lutea for maintaining pregnancy. The research also examines the effects of hormone therapy on ovariectomized pregnant females and explores the connection between the pregnant uterus and ovaries.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Reproductive Biology
